events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving their car and another vehicle at a traffic light intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the reported incident details related to the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to review the claimant’s vehicle accident case for faster resolution.
Acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and confirmed the initiation of processing with an estimated timeline for investigation.
Requested additional documents from the claimant, including photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and insurance policy copy.
The claimant has submitted all requested documentation for the accident, including detailed photos and the official police accident report.
Investigation into the auto accident claim has commenced, focusing on verifying the circumstances and evaluating liability assessment.
Completed thorough investigation confirming fault was partially shared by both drivers involved in the vehicle collision.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs of the insured’s vehicle as well as related medical expenses.
The customer provided positive feedback on the claim process, highlighting clear communication and timely updates received.
Claim approval was granted following acceptance of the settlement proposal and verification of all necessary documentation.
Issued payment to the claimant as per the approved settlement amount to cover all damages resulting from the auto accident.
The claim related to the vehicle collision has been officially closed following successful resolution and customer satisfaction.
